Producer: Harold Becker, Charles Mulvehill, Rachel Pfeffer
Production Co: New Line Cinema, Nelvana, Castle Rock Entertainment
Synopsis: Suburban Boston professional couple Andy (Bill Pullman) and Tracy (Nicole Kidman) become entangled with cocky trauma surgeon Dr. Jed Hill (Alec Baldwin), an old classmate of Andy's whom they invite to become their tenant in the large Victorian home they're renovating. Things become even more tangled when college dean Andy becomes implicated in a campus serial rape investigation and Jed performs an emergency surgery on Tracy with unforeseen complications that disrupt all their lives.
Title: Malice
